ovdesc.p: This application is the parameter file which is used to hold the local tax that will be applicable for securities. This can be defined for specific TXN.TAX.CODE or COMPANY or SYSTEM.

desc.p: This field holds the type of transaction basis for the allocation/unallocation of nominals in ET files.
Valid Inputs are 'FIFO'(First In First Out) ,'LIFO' (Last In First Out) or 'AVERAGE'
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
